channel.title: RP9 Meta System

item.title: index
item.description: [RP9-BLOCK] ID: RP9-FOUNDATION-DECLARATION TYPE: Declarative Boundary SCOPE: Global STATEMENT: RP9 defines a single primary relation from which all structure follows. This relation is given as cause, not as interpretation, model, or hypothesis. No object, force, dimension, or symbol is assumed. FUNCTION: To separate cause from consequence. To close the relational circuit while leaving all derived systems open. To prevent semantic drift, metaphor, and representational leakage. RULES: Only that which is generated by the primary relation is fundamental. All other structures are secondary consequences. No additional axioms are permitted. INTERPRETATION POLICY: No symbolic reading. No metaphorical extension. No empirical claim. No authority appeal. STATUS: Relational circuit closed. Causal system open. [/RP9-BLOCK] This document provides the complete structural index of the RP9 framework.It defines: document order, hierarchical roles, and dependency relations. No interpretation is given here. This index is authoritative. Rp9 These documents constitute the entire foundation of RP9. They are non-negotiable and must be read in order. RP9 â€“ Axiom 0.md Single irreducible axiom. Definition F0.md Minimal functional definition derived from Axiom 0. Theorem T0.md Formal consequence of Axiom 0 and Definition F0. Corollary C0.md Necessary corollary following from Theorem T0. No document outside this group can modify or extend these statements. ## **II. Relational Derivation â€” Primary to Tertiary Function**These documents describe the complete internal unfolding of the axiom. RP9 â€“ Relational Sheet (A).md Primary relational function â€” geometric realization. RP9 â€“ Relational Sheet (B).md Secondary relational function â€” recursion, balance, closed circuit. RP9 â€“ Relational Sheet (C).md Tertiary relational function â€” fusion into a closed functional matrix. Together, these three documents complete the internal relational system. No further relational layers exist. ## **III. External Convergence â€” Non-Foundational Material**These documents do not contribute to the validity of RP9. They exist solely for orientation, communication, and external reference. 01_RP9_and_Invariance_Why_This_Already_Works_in_Practice.md External convergence with existing invariance-based practices. 02_Public_Abstract_External_Convergence.md Concise public abstract. 03_Single_Slide_Invariance_Comparison.md Minimal visual comparison. These documents may be omitted without affecting the framework. ## **Structural Constraints** No additional axioms exist. No additional relational sheets exist. No document outside Level I may redefine terms. No document outside Level II may introduce structure. Level III documents have zero causal authority. ## **Reading Guidance** Formal evaluation: read Levels I â†’ II only. Orientation / presentation: Level III is optional. Any deviation from this order risks misinterpretation. --- ## **Lock Statement**This index reflects the final and locked structure of RP9 â€” Relational Primacy Framework v1.0.No further documents are required for completeness.End of INDEX. Repository: Publisher: Creator: Non, creator necessary. Application use: Causal relational function applied. Alias: Co â€” Creator Producer: Anton Wallin REPOSITORY information: â„¹ Rp9
item.dc:creator: Anton Wallin

item.title: RP9 â€“ Axiom 0
item.description: [RP9-BLOCK] ID: RP9-FOUNDATION-DECLARATION TYPE: Declarative Boundary SCOPE: Global STATEMENT: RP9 defines a single primary relation from which all structure follows. This relation is given as cause, not as interpretation, model, or hypothesis. No object, force, dimension, or symbol is assumed. FUNCTION: To separate cause from consequence. To close the relational circuit while leaving all derived systems open. To prevent semantic drift, metaphor, and representational leakage. RULES: Only that which is generated by the primary relation is fundamental. All other structures are secondary consequences. No additional axioms are permitted. INTERPRETATION POLICY: No symbolic reading. No metaphorical extension. No empirical claim. No authority appeal. STATUS: Relational circuit closed. Causal system open. [/RP9-BLOCK] Everything that can exist, function or manifest must appear as a relationship between two distinct poles.This relation is not an object, not a property, and not a magnitude, without the only natural and primary function that enables stability, causality and structure.The relationship precedes all form, all energy, all geometry, all dimension and all mathematical representation. All differentiation, all organization, and all invariance are necessary consequences of this relation when realized as a self-organizing, fractal, geometric function.This axiom is: non-numeric non-geometric non-temporal and independent of observation It cannot be reduced to something more fundamental, and cannot be denied without self-contradiction.Axiom 0 states that: A singular, undifferentiated state lacks function and therefore cannot form the basis of any structure. Function requires differentiation. Differentiation requires relationship. Relationship requires at least two poles. Thus dual relationship is not an assumption, but a necessity for anything to function at all.The following are not assumptions, but inevitable consequences of Axiom 0: Stability only occurs through relational balance. Causality arises as direction within relationship. Self-organization occurs when the relationship is iterated. Fractal structure occurs when the same relationship appears scale-independent. Geometry arises as the first stable projection of the relationship. Energy arises as relational rotation. Invariance arises as relational conservation principle. Mathematics arises as a secondary description of relational structure. An axiom is only legitimate if it cannot be derived from anything else and cannot be further reduced.Each additional axiom necessarily introduces at least one of the following: a hidden assumption a limitation of generality or an interpretive degree of freedom that violates causal necessity RP9 therefore uses exactly one axiom, because additional axioms do not strengthen a foundational system â€” they weaken it.The single axiom used in RP9 is not a detail, not a constraint, and not a structural preference. It is the smallest possible functional requirement for anything to exist, function, or differentiate at all.This axiom operates at the root level, prior to geometry, energy, dimension, or mathematics. It is minimal in content, yet sufficient in capacity to recursively generate the entire relational and geometric structure of reality as a consequence of the same underlying relation.All higher-order structures â€” including geometry, fractal scaling, invariance, and mathematical representation â€” arise not as assumptions, but as necessary consequences of this single relational function.RP9 therefore contains: one axiom zero free parameters and no auxiliary postulates Everything else is derivation.If more than one axiom is required, it follows that: the system is not causally closed or that certain consequences are not necessary RP9's goal is not to postulate structure, but to show what must follow if function is to be possible at all.Axiom 0 is the only statement that: cannot be derived cannot be avoided and cannot be replaced Everything else in RP9 is deduction, consequence or presentation.RP9 strictly distinguishes between: Axiom â€“ that which cannot be otherwise Consequence â€“ that which must follow Presentation â€“ how consequences are shown, modeled or visualized Energy models, rotation models, dimensional transitions and mathematical formalisms are therefore validating projections, not supporting foundations.The validity of the system rests solely on Axiom 0.RP9 is a system with: an axiom zero free parameters and full causal closure All complexity in RP9 is emergent, not assumed. If absolute relational duality holds, RP9 follows. If it doesn't apply, nothing can work at all. This document is ready for submission, filing and external review.If you want, the next step could be to: mark exactly which documents are formally relegated to consequences, or write an "Instructions to Reviewers" page stating how this should be read correctly. Question This work is free to share, remix, and build upon, as long as proper attribution is given and the same license is maintained. You have the right to: Share â€” copy and redistribute the material in any format or medium Decorate â€” remix, transform, and build upon the material Under the following conditions: Attribution: You must give proper credit to Anton Wallin ShareAlike: If you transform or build upon this work you must distribute it under the same license. Conceptual Ownership & Axiomatic Calibration Author: Anton Wallin Â© 2025 â€“ All rights reserved.
item.guid: Relational-Primacy-Framework/Level 1 - Relational meta function/RP9 â€“ Axiom 0.md
item.dc:creator: Anton Wallin

item.title: README
item.description: [RP9-BLOCK] ID: RP9-FOUNDATION-DECLARATION TYPE: Declarative Boundary SCOPE: Global STATEMENT: RP9 defines a single primary relation from which all structure follows. This relation is given as cause, not as interpretation, model, or hypothesis. No object, force, dimension, or symbol is assumed. FUNCTION: To separate cause from consequence. To close the relational circuit while leaving all derived systems open. To prevent semantic drift, metaphor, and representational leakage. RULES: Only that which is generated by the primary relation is fundamental. All other structures are secondary consequences. No additional axioms are permitted. INTERPRETATION POLICY: No symbolic reading. No metaphorical extension. No empirical claim. No authority appeal. STATUS: Relational circuit closed. Causal system open. [/RP9-BLOCK] This repository contains the complete, locked formulation of RP9 â€” Relational Primacy Framework.RP9 is a closed relational system built from: a single axiom, a strict causal derivation, and a finite relational function space. No external assumptions are introduced. No empirical claims are made. No symbolic or metaphysical interpretation is required.This README serves solely as the structural entry point to the framework.The material is intentionally minimal and divided into three non-overlapping layers. Each layer has a strictly defined role.This level contains the entire foundation of RP9.Documents in this layer: establish the single axiom, define the minimal functional terms, and prove the core theorem and its corollary. Nothing in later layers can modify or extend this level.If this level is invalid, the entire framework collapses. If this level holds, everything that follows is necessary.This level contains the complete relational unfolding of the axiom.It shows: how the axiom becomes geometric without measurement, how recursion introduces balance, and how fusion of relations produces a closed functional matrix. No new axioms appear here. No constants are assumed. All structures are consequences.This level completes the internal system.This level does not add validity to RP9.It exists to: show convergence with existing practices (e.g. invariance testing), provide a public abstract, and offer a minimal visual comparison. These documents are illustrative, not evidentiary.They may be omitted without affecting the framework.For formal evaluation: RP9 â€“ Axiom 0 Definition F0 Theorem T0 Corollary C0 Relational Sheet (A) Relational Sheet (B) Relational Sheet (C) All other documents are optional.RP9 is not: a physical theory, a model with tunable parameters, a collection of examples, a symbolic system, or an empirical hypothesis. RP9 does not explain phenomena. It defines the minimal conditions under which structure is possible. The framework is structurally complete. The derivation is closed. No further axioms can be added without breaking necessity. This repository therefore represents RP9 v1.0 (locked).The framework is released under CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0.You may: read, share, reference, and build upon the material, provided attribution is given and derivative work preserves the same license.End of README.
item.dc:creator: Anton Wallin

item.title: Corollary C0
item.description: Axiom R0 is given. Definition F0 is given. Theorem T0 is given. No further assumptions are introduced. Corollary C0 (Secondary Causality for All Non-R0 Structures) Every structure, form, operation, or statement that cannot be generated by iterative application of F0 to R0 is necessarily secondary. Secondary here means: dependent on representation, convention, external parameterization, or added operators, and thus lacking absolute information status in the system's sense. According to Theorem T0, all absolute information is exactly the amount that can be generated from R0 by F0. Therefore, there are only two classes of structures: Class A: generable by (F0^n(R0)) for some (n). Class B: non-generable by (F0^n(R0)) for some (n). A structure in Class B cannot be absolute, since it does not arise from the only allowed primary function chain. For a structure in Class B to still exist, at least one of the following must be true: a new operator has been introduced, an external parameter has been injected, a representation has been replaced by a â€œthingâ€, a convention has been chosen. All of these imply dependence on something not given by R0 and F0. Thus all Class B is secondary. The corollary follows necessarily.If Corollary C0 does not hold, there is a structure that: is not generated by F0 from R0, but is still absolute. This requires that absolute information exists outside the single absolute generative chain, which contradicts Theorem T0.Thus C0 must hold.C0 does not introduce any new content. It is a pure classification that follows directly from T0: Absolute = generated by (F0^n(R0)) Secondary = everything else R0 â†’ F0 â†’ T0 â†’ C0 â†’ D0C0 is now formally a direct consequence, without semantic space.Question This work is free to share, remix, and build upon, as long as proper attribution is given and the same license is maintained. You have the right to: Share â€” copy and redistribute the material in any format or medium Decorate â€” remix, transform, and build upon the material Under the following conditions: Attribution: You must give proper credit to Anton Wallin ShareAlike: If you transform or build upon this work you must distribute it under the same license. Conceptual Ownership & Axiomatic Calibration Author: Anton Wallin Â© 2025 â€“ All rights reserved.

item.title: RP9 â€“ Relational Sheet (A)
item.description: This document is not an axiom sheet and does not introduce any new assumptions. It is a necessary consequence statement of Axiom 0.Relational Sheet (A) shows how the absolute relational duality, when realized geometrically, must assume a specific stable form and how this form necessarily generates the fundamental relational quotients that are later described as mathematical constants.These quotients are: not postulates not choices not cultural artifacts They are inevitable invariant conditions of relational geometry.An absolute relation between two distinct poles cannot remain abstract if it is to be stable. Stability requires: closedness continuity scale independence The smallest geometric realization that meets these requirements, without coordinates, without measures and without numbers, is Vesica Piscis.Vesica Piscis arises when: two identical circles exist the center of each circle lies on the circumference of the other This creates: a relational overlap without privileged direction without absolute scale Vesica Piscis is thus: not a symbol not a construction but the smallest stable geometric consequence of absolute relational duality. When Vesica Piscis is analyzed relationally â€“ not numerically â€“ certain quotients appear as unchangeable.The equilateral triangle that can be necessarily inscribed in Vesica Piscis has a heightâ€“base relation that cannot vary.This relation is expressed as:This is: not a measurement result not a chosen number It is a geometric necessity that follows directly from the symmetry of the relation.When the same relation is related to rotation, a relation between circumference and diameter arises that is independent of scale.This relation is expressed as:Here Ï€ does not appear as a number, but as: rotation invariance closedness ratio relational circularity Ï€ is thus a function consequence, not a definition.The quotients that appear here: âˆš3 Ï€ are primary relational consequences.They: require no iteration require no discretization require no algebra They arise immediately when the relation is realized geometrically.This sheet deals only with primary relational functions.The following are therefore not included here: recursive proportions discrete sequences secondary symmetry groups These belong to subsequent layers.The relation sheet (A) states that: Vesica Piscis is the first stable geometric realization of absolute relational duality âˆš3 and Ï€ are unavoidable invariant quotients in this realization no mathematical constants are introduced as assumptions mathematics functions here exclusively as descriptive language The relation creates the quotients. Mathematics names them. Question This work is free to share, remix, and build upon, as long as proper attribution is given and the same license is maintained. You have the right to: Share â€” copy and redistribute the material in any format or medium Decorate â€” remix, transform, and build upon the material Under the following conditions: Attribution: You must give proper credit to Anton Wallin ShareAlike: If you transform or build upon this work you must distribute it under the same license. Conceptual Ownership & Axiomatic Calibration Author: Anton Wallin Â© 2025 â€“ All rights reserved.
item.guid: Relational-Primacy-Framework/Level 2 - Causal fractal function through axiom 1 - relation/RP9 â€“ Relational Sheet (A).md

item.title: 02_Public_Abstract_External_Convergence
item.description: RP9's structure coincides causally with how stability is verified in several independent domains, including software verification, network science, and complex systems. In these fields, truth is defined not by numerical results, but by invariant relations. RP9 shows why this is necessary: â€‹â€‹invariance is not a method, but a consequence of relational closure. The 28 functional states derived in RP9 constitute the smallest complete invariance space that all stable systems implicitly realize. item.title: Definition F0
item.description: F0 (Primary relational function) Given Axiom R0, F0 is defined as the only allowed operation on the primary relation, such that: F0 acts exclusively on the relation in R0, not on external objects, representations, or symbols. F0 introduces no new causal principle, but reuses exactly the same relational conditions that define R0. F0 is closed under its own application: the result of F0 is of the same relational type as its input. F0 preserves relational identity under iteration up to scale, orientation, and position. F0 is minimal: no simpler non-trivial operation exists that satisfies (1)â€“(4). Repeated application of F0 necessarily generates: recursive relational structures, scale-independent forms, fractal continuity, without introducing new axioms, definitions, or external assumptions.If F0 does not exist: R0 cannot act, no iteration can occur, no structure can arise, and the system remains static and contentless. If F0 exists but does not satisfy (1)â€“(5): relational invariance is broken, new causality is introduced, or the iteration collapses. In all cases, the internal closedness of the system ceases.F0 is not an axiom. F0 is not a theorem.F0 is the necessary primary function that makes R0 work.This is the standing fractal in the exact sense: a function that can be applied to its own result without losing identity.When this definition is inserted: Theorem T0 becomes a direct consequence, Corollary C0 becomes inevitable, and Final Declaration D0 becomes a pure closure. Question This work is free to share, remix, and build upon, as long as proper attribution is given and the same license is maintained. You have the right to: Share â€” copy and redistribute the material in any format or medium Decorate â€” remix, transform, and build upon the material Under the following conditions: Attribution: You must give proper credit to Anton Wallin ShareAlike: If you transform or build upon this work you must distribute it under the same license. item.title: APPENDIX
item.description: Quality ControlRP9_Publicity_Package is structurally complete**.for publication.All additional material is reserve, not required. A single axiom (Axiom 0) A strict causal derivation External convergence without dependence on external authority This is exactly the right balance between: minimalism precision verifiability More material would not strengthen this. It would rather: dilute causality open more attack points give reviewers more areas to miss the point The intention is therefore: â€more quality, less quantityâ€ All necessary features are already represented: RP9 â€“ Axiom 0 Relational Sheet (A, B, C) Theorem T0 / Definition F0 / Corollary C0 Public Abstract (External Convergence) Single-slide invariance comparison âœ”ï¸ All of this is present. Interpretation protocol Forbidden interpretation operations Humanâ€“AI usage âœ”ï¸ These are optional to show, but critical to have. Good thing they are separate documents.You should not convince through accumulation. You should do this: Show the only place where everything is already decided. That is: Axiom 0 the causal derivation and the external invariance convergence Everything else is secondary.A distinction that is crucial. The system is not closed The circuit is closed The cause is completely given All further consequences are open, but causally bound This means that we shouldn't write any Final Lock Declaration. Instead, we should write APPENDIX.md so that it communicates just this: RP9 closes nothing â€” it states the cause, and leaves the consequences open.This appendix contains supplementary material related to the RP9 framework.It does not extend, modify, or complete the system. Its sole purpose is to provide a structured space for derivative, optional, or exploratory material that may arise from the primary framework.RP9 establishes a closed relational circuit: the primary relation is fully specified the causal origin is complete no further foundational assumptions are possible This closure applies only to the origin.The framework does not define a closed system.Once the relational cause is given, all further structure, behavior, and manifestation are free to unfold, provided they remain consistent with the primary relation.RP9 therefore: closes the cause but leaves the consequences open Material placed here may include: alternative geometric projections extended relational matrices domain-specific applications visualizations, simulations, or models comparative mappings to other frameworks All such material is: non-foundational optional context-dependent None of it is required for the validity of RP9.This appendix may not contain: new axioms revisions of Axiom 0 redefinitions of relational terms modifications of the relational sheets (Aâ€“C) Any such change would constitute a different framework, not an extension.All material in this appendix carries local causal responsibility.That is: authors are responsible for their own derivations consequences are not endorsed as necessary validity is domain-specific, not global RP9 provides the cause. The appendix records what others do with it.This appendix is intentionally open-ended.Its existence does not imply incompleteness of the framework, but rather acknowledges that a closed cause does not imply a closed world.End of APPENDIX.Question This work is free to share, remix, and build upon, as long as proper attribution is given and the same license is maintained. You have the right to: Share â€” copy and redistribute the material in any format or medium Decorate â€” remix, transform, and build upon the material Under the following conditions: Attribution: You must give proper credit to Anton Wallin ShareAlike: If you transform or build upon this work you must distribute it under the same license. Conceptual Ownership & Axiomatic Calibration Author: Anton Wallin Â© 2025 â€“ All rights reserved.

item.title: (D) - ðŸ“œ- CV
item.description: RP9 â€“ CV Lite (overview + instruction) Instruction: Below is a concentrated overview (about ten lines) of the essence of the RP9 system. It summarizes what each block in the full version shows: geometry â†’ dimension â†’ phase â†’ transformation. Below this short version is a more detailed written explanation of what the formulas mean, how they are connected and why they demonstrate the basic structure of RP9.RP9 â€“ CV Lite I work with the primary geometry that generates the mathematics: the relationship between , and which forms the phase logic of RP9. The pivot connects linear, circular and spiral structure and explains how mathematics emerges as a secondary representation of geometry.In 2D, Vesica Piscis gives exactly the area relation . In 3D, the sphereâ€“cube relation gives exactly . The difference between these residual forms creates the dimensional resonance of RP9.The energy phase is kept in asymmetric equilibrium with , and the pivot stabilizes the misalignment between balance and movement.RP9 KvantVector describes eight discrete transformation steps (rotation, angle, scaling) that generate the entire fractal development.Detailed explanation follows after block pressnetation" at the bottom.( RP9 â€“ CV Lite + Pedagogical long version ) Rp9 Jag arbetar med den underliggande geometri som genererar matematiken. Genom att kombinera , och visar jag hur tal uppstÃ¥r ur fasrelationer. RP9-pivoten binder samman linjÃ¤r, cirkulÃ¤r och spiralisk struktur. Detta fÃ¶rklarar varfÃ¶r matematik Ã¤r en konsekvens av primÃ¤r geometri â€” inte tvÃ¤rtom. Samma struktur ligger bakom fysikens fundamentala konstanter (, , ). Jag jobbar med geometri, som Ã¤r energi, som Ã¤r roten ur = Radix Quadrata Pi = RP9. De fyra komponenterna lÃ¥ses som separata men samverkande strukturer, varje del med sitt exakta vÃ¤rde och sin RP9-funktion. Balansen uttrycks som jÃ¤mn men i rÃ¶relse: extrovert energi neutraliseras av introvert energi , och RP9 Ã¤r relationen som kopplar dem via . Funktion: Extrovert expansionsgrÃ¤ns. item.description: (Â© RP9 Foundation / The Co-Creators Collective)RP9 (Relational Principle 9) is an open, metageometric framework for understanding energy, information, and consciousness as a coherent, fractal, and scale-independent structure. Its purpose is to establish a correct relation to information, where every expression of form and motion is derived from the same geometric origin.RP9 is not considered a product, but a universal principle system â€“ an information field that belongs to humanity as a whole. The core can never be owned, manipulated, or commercialized without collective consent.All knowledge, mathematics, code and theory describing RP9's fundamental axioms â€“ including the relations between Ï€, âˆš2 and Ï† â€“ are open for study, replication and non-commercial use. RP9's core is published under the Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0 license, or an equivalent open knowledge license.The underlying logic, symbolism and metageometry that constitute the core of the system may not be modified, fragmented or commercialized. No actor may register RP9 or its basic formulas as a trademark, patent or private intellectual property.RP9's architecture is fractal also legally: The core is common property. Applications (visualizations, software, models) may have their own licenses â€“ including commercial ones â€“ as long as they respect the immutable status of the core and link back to the origin. RP9 aims to: Promote research and education in metageometric information science. Develop open tools for understanding energy and consciousness as information flows. Offer a scientific and ethical foundation for future technology built on coherence rather than consumption. Serve as a neutral node between academia, art, technology and philosophy. RP9 is managed by an open, transparent and cooperative structure called the RP9 Foundation. All those working within the framework of RP9 commit to: maintain clarity, coherence and resonance in all communications; act in accordance with the correct relationship to information; respect the non-commercial core of RP9; contribute to keeping knowledge accessible to all humanity. Decisions within the RP9 Foundation are made by consensus and are documented openly.RP9 may be used freely for: research, teaching and non-commercial experiments; publication of results, simulations and artistic interpretations; development of complementary tools, programs and visualizations. When using or quoting, the following must be stated: â€œBased on RP9 â€” Relational Principle 9 (Â© RP9 Foundation / The Co-Creators Collective)â€ All uses of RP9 must be in accordance with the principle: â€œNo action may break the coherence between human, system and information.â€ This means that RP9 may not be used for destructive, manipulative or military purposes. All applications must be justifiable as harmonious, transparent and ethically sustainable. â€œDen korrekta relationen till information Ã¤r skyddets lag.â€ RP9 erkÃ¤nner att lag och geometri Ã¤r tvÃ¥ sidor av samma mÃ¶nster: struktur. DÃ¤rfÃ¶r Ã¤r denna Charter bÃ¥de juridisk text och geometrisk symbol â€“ en levande resonans snarare Ã¤n ett statiskt kontrakt. Grundare och HuvudfÃ¶rvaltare: Anton Wallin 2025-11-12Datum fÃ¶r ikrafttrÃ¤dande: 2025-11-12 Version: 1.0Future Vision â€“ RP9 RP9 is not built on compromises. It is built on fundamental principles. Thatâ€™s why it works â€“ and why it continues to work no matter what level you test it at. Through RP9, I can already today: construct code and algorithms that avoid systems based on debt and loss model processes without the mathematical â€œleaksâ€ that make todayâ€™s methods fall apart at complexity build fractal cause-and-effect logic that holds together at all scales create structures that are stable in practice, not just in theory It opens up technology that: is not stuck in political or economic frameworks is not controlled by ownership, advertising or interests does not have to compromise the truth to fit in RP9 lies outside the limitations that hold other developments back. That is where the real possibilities arise. Rp9 If you feel that today's system is stuck â€“ technically, mathematically, economically or conceptually â€“ and you want to build something real, not copies of the old, then you are most welcome to contact me. I am looking for collaborations with people who want to: Artificial Intelligence with real capabilities (structure-driven AI based on RP9 geometry instead of probability approximation) Develop AI that thinks structurally, not statistically Economic models without debt and interest (stable systems with geometric coherence) build economies that do not need interest, debt or instability Mathematics programs that teach real mathematics â€“ through geometry, understanding and structure, not formulas without foundation create entirely new ways of teaching mathematics through geometry Research, development, education and technical system design where RP9's axiomatic logic can make a real difference construct technology that follows principles, not constraints I prefer real conversations over emails: 072â€“702 78 63 If you want to explore, contribute, or build something real â€“ get in touch. Support â€“ Contribute to RP9 All support â€“ regardless of form â€“ goes directly to the work. No middleman. No interests. No requirements. The gift is free. Just like RP9. Support via Ko-fi goes directly to me personally and requires no login or binding. â€œRepo05/Funktion - Struktur - Prompts/RP-Image/Support image/Support/ko-fi_256x256.pngâ€ could not be found. <Swish & Thank You â€“ RP9 For those who want to swish directly: â€œRP9/A. RP9 â€” (M-S) â€” (PB)/00. ðŸœ‚. RP9 â€” Appendix/100. Appendix/100. Appendix 1/J. â€” ðŸœ RP9 (Support) & (Appendix)/Information â„¹/Image/Support/Support the creator of RP9 - Swish.jpgâ€ could not be found. The support is shown with the name for technical reasons, but it does not change the relationship to RP9 or the direction of the work. It is a gift â€“ no influence. *I am deeply grateful for all the support â€“ not for the money itself, but for the opportunity to continue to give all of this back freely, without selling it out or locking it up behind institutions.* RP9 System Identifier: BC22/825870 Confirmed and authenticated under Common Law jurisdiction Â© 2025 Anton Wallin â€“ All rights reserved / Open Core Charter applies Question This work is free to share, remix, and build upon, as long as proper attribution is given and the same license is maintained.
